description.en-US:
[!WARNING] DO NOT UPDATE to X (formerly Twitter) 10.85.0-beta.1 or greater, this version includes Google latest apk anti-tampering and anti-hooking, we have no solution for this, anyone try to modify the apk or hook, the app will crash.

Hachidori

A X (formerly Twitter) Xposed modules.

Requirements

  • LSPosed v1.9.2 (7024) (Rooted Android only) and above
